document.full_text: chrysler group llc, which came to the brink of collapse before a federal bailout in 2009, plans to fully repay more than $7 billion in loans from the u.s. and canadian governments by the end of june.
document.title: chrysler to fully repay u.s. and canada loans
lines_and_colors: chrysler group llc, which came to the brink of collapse before a federal bailout in 2009, plans to fully repay more than $7 billion in loans from the u.s. and canadian governments by the end of june.
